tasks.label: npm: install and dev
tasks.command: if not exist node_modules npm install && npm run dev

windows.command: if (-not (Test-Path "node_modules")) { npm install }; npm run dev

linux.command: if [ ! -d node_modules ]; then npm install; fi && npm run dev

osx.command: if [ ! -d node_modules ]; then npm install; fi && npm run dev
